topic.title: History Of Past Illness Section - conformance rules

lines.i: This section describes the history related to the patient's past complaints, problems, or diagnoses. It records these details up until and possibly pertinent to the patient's current complaint or reason for seeking medical care.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10390 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.20"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15474)/@code="11348-0" HISTORY OF PAST ILLNESS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15475)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry (CONF:8792)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15474)/@code="11348-0" HISTORY OF PAST ILLNESS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15475)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry (CONF:8792)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
